page.title: 09Social Concern
page.content: Near the golf course is a beach called Petitor beach.This is a "bare bodies" beach where lots of men and women come down to get sunburnt. This is what Julia thinks about the beach. "I think it's disgusting the way the council let people take all their clothes off so they can sunbathe naked .Any respectful person could walk along the coastle path and see all these naked people.The locals should be ashamed of themselves!The grockles, alias holiday makers,should have more respect for someone else's town. This is what Claire thinks. "Petitor beach is down in a ditch where nobody can see.If you want to look at the beach you have to go down and look through the trees.Old people couldn't get there anyway.Why can't they have Petitor as a nudist beach?
